statements: UPDATE RoboAdvisorClients SET client_name='John Doe', client_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE client_id=1;

UPDATE financial_data SET financial_records = '{"revenue": 5000, "expenses": 2000}' WHERE data_id = 3;
UPDATE clients SET client_name = 'John Doe', client_email = 'john.doe@example.com', client_phone = '+1234567890' WHERE client_id = 1;

UPDATE transactions SET amount=500.00, transaction_date='2022-01-31' WHERE transaction_id=100;
